dct_description_sm: Appears in: Matthias Quad's Geographisch Hand Buch (1600)

German text on verso mentions the work of Leo Africanus. Also states of Da Gama's voyage
        and the fact that the inhabitants are black.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Dr. Oscar I. Norwich collection of maps of Africa and its islands, 1486 - ca. 1865 courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain.
